transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: To the EE voicemail. I'm sorry, but the person you've called is not available. Please leave your message after the tone. After you've finished your message, just hang up. Or to hear more options, please press 1.
Speaker B: Hi Rohit, this is Shikha from Amber Student and this call is regarding your accommodation. You are searching in London so let me know your convenient time to connect with you. Or else you can reach out to me on WhatsApp. Thank you.
Speaker A: To the EE voicemail. I'm sorry, but the person you've called is not available.

Speaker B: Hello.
Speaker A: Hello.
Speaker B: Hello.
Speaker A: Hello.
Speaker B: Hello.
Speaker A: You've been speaking with Rohit.
Speaker B: Yeah.
Speaker A: Yeah. Hi Rohit, this is Shikhal from Amber somewhere. Yeah, I'm calling from Amber. Student. This is regarding your accommodation.
Speaker B: Oh yeah, yeah.
Speaker A: Yeah. So we had it connected on WhatsApp. Regarding the same like I have suggested you few option over there.
Speaker B: Oh, did you send me options?
Speaker A: Yeah, I shared some option on WhatsApp. Did you check those?
Speaker B: Oh no, I forgot to check them. I'll check them now.
Speaker A: All right, all right. I'll just ping you again. You can just have a look.
Speaker B: That's fine. Thank you.
Speaker A: No worries.
